subject: Re: [EVP-ITC] Episode of Supernatural.....

Rhonda:
                Me & Joel watch it Monday night and I have to admit that my guess is that the writers for the show differently watch the paranormal forums and probably listen to coast to coast, given some of the episodes. Therefore, I will say, box communication has hit the big time even in the world of make believe TV!

Rhonda W <rhondak1973@...> wrote:
            So I was just watching last weeked tivo'ed episode of Supernatural....nothing special til they say they are in Edisons hometown and the whole episode is about his invention...the spirit phone.   Just wondering if anyone saw the show? Im still at the beginning but thought Id share a little lol moment in my tv watching =)
   
  Thinking of ya'll...hope everyone is having a good week.
   
  Rhonda
